title: sweeteye
author: sweeteye
created_time: September 27, 2022, 03:34:34 PMLast edit: September 28, 2022, 02:29:18 PM by sweeteye
content: Up for auction is a 2013 LEALANA UNFUNDED / BUYER FUNDED Ag #789 (answering the age old question, "Why is 6 afraid of 7...") with BLACK ADDRESS      What's the deal with the black address? I'm not sure of the veracity of the claims below, but my guess is that Stack's Bowers got their information from YouTube:"Only 2,000 Lealana 0.1 Bitcoins were issued in silver, and this buyer-funded example with a black address is a great rarity, one of only 10 issued. It is considered part of the limited Series 1 Lealana coins, offered before the address color was changed to green in May 2014 to comply with regulations."https://auctions.stacksbowers.com/lots/view/3-TYP2B/2013-silver-lealana-01-bitcoin-btc-no-3605-series-1-unredeemed-buyer-funded-black-address-troy-ounce-999-silver-25mm-sp-7 Also, would you look at that sale price, WTAF?! CryptoVice's August 2017 YouTube video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hLWpSKAkCA0Whatever the facts are (and members feel free to comment with factual info) it's undisputable that this is a beautiful coin, and something of a rarity. EDIT: Please see community comments/add'l info re; issuance for .10 SILVER BF/Blk in this thread if interested: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415111.0Funding address: https://btcscan.org/address/1BTCcsZB6kk8fS2LCdBqkuWwZ3e53DNSfhSTARTING BID: 0.015 BTC (edited)MINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002 BTC (edited)**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: Tuesday, October 4th, 2022, 17:00:00 EST (5pm NYC)**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added from the time of that bid.ESCROW: If desired, with mutually agreed upon agent at buyer's expenseSHIPPING: Buyer’s expense based on location and preferencePAYMENT: BTC only to bc1q9d8uqxrt3pcsl8c4m46s2refcr9wahau0ytl8x

comments.author: QuakerBull
comments.created_time: September 27, 2022, 03:38:30 PMLast edit: September 27, 2022, 07:05:18 PM by QuakerBull

comments.author: Agrawas
comments.body: Just wanted to clarify on these, these are not limited to 10 in anyway.. there are lot more of these in existence..

comments.author: sweeteye
comments.body: Quote from: Agrawas on September 27, 2022, 03:47:56 PMJust wanted to clarify on these, these are not limited to 10 in anyway.. there are lot more of these in existence.. Do we know how many, or if they are rarer than not?Thanks!

comments.author: Agrawas
comments.body: To me they are definitely rarer than the other silvers or brass tenths, but the way they have been marketed with a mintage of 10-15-20 even 25, I can guarantee that they are more than 50..

comments.author: sweeteye
comments.body: In light of new info posted in this thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5415111.0 I have lowered opening bid and bid increase minimums in OP. If there are no bids in 24 hours, I'll lock the thread and repost at a later date.
